\subsection*{Additional Inherited Members}


\subsection{Detailed Description}
Class holding a number of functions which helps the site work more effectively with Ad\-Words

Referrals\-: \hyperlink{classad_words}{ad\-Words} (date\-\_\-added, src, medium, campaign, network, kw, ad\-I\-D, c\-Key) Content\-: ad\-Words\-Content(ad\-Words\-Content\-I\-D, ad\-Words\-Content\-Title, ad\-Words\-Content)
